description: Internal and external alterations including the installation of a kitchen into the existing billiard room involving alterations to non-load bearing walls and installation of a partition, removal of the existing saloon and lounge bars to provide seating areas, the removal of the existing green room bar with retention of back fitting to form high level seating area, alterations to form opening between the green room and function room, the installation of a bar in the function room using reused timber and fittings, the installation of toilets within the existing office, alterations to existing toilets, alterations to the function room stage area including stepped access booth seating and the installation of the back bar from the lounge as a feature, internal seating including some booth seating and raised banquette seating, internal access lobby, repairs to skylight, alterations to some internal doorways, general internal refurbishment and redecoration including  lighting, conversion of 2 first floor bedrooms to provide staff facilities , conversion of first floor kitchen to bedroom, first floor roof terrace including  openings and external alterations including repair and repainting of external elevations, repairs to windows and parapet, smoking shelter and bin store and external seating adjoining the listed building all in association with the re-use of the building as a public house with first floor ancillary guest house accommodation (Listed Building Consent).
